FrostDepth.description: Frost depth for the location of the building in feet. Minimum of -2

AssumedFootingThickness.description: Thickness of the footing in inches. Minimum of 12

ExtFtgTSlabtoTFtg.description: Distance in feet from the top of slab to the top of footing for the exterior footings

IntFtgTSlabtoTFtg.description: Distance in feet from the top of the slab to the top of the footing for the interior footings

SoilBearingCapacity.description: Soil bearing capacity in PSF. 2500 if no geotech

FootingReinforced.description: True if the footing is reinforced. Reinforced if frost depth <= -3.5 feet

SpreadFootingMinWidth.description: Minimum width of the spreadfootings in feet. Typically 2

ContFootingMinWidth.description: Minimum width of the continuous footing in feet. Typically 2

ConcreteStrength.decsription: Strength of the concrete in PSI. Typically 3000
